org.mini2Dx.core.collision

Class CollisionPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Polygon
        • org.mini2Dx.core.collision.CollisionPolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionArea, CollisionObject, Positionable, PositionChangeListener<CollisionPolygon>, Sizeable, SizeChangeListener<CollisionPolygon>, Interpolatable, org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuadTreeAwareCollisionPolygon

    public class CollisionPolygon
extends Polygon
implements CollisionArea, PositionChangeListener<CollisionPolygon>, SizeChangeListener<CollisionPolygon>
    An implementation of Polygon that allows for interpolation. Game objects can use this class to move around the game world and retrieve the appropriate rendering coordinates during the render phase.
